bug.summary: can not create alluxio-fuse pod when using helm to release alluxio charts
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.3.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug There is a bug when I use helm to deploy alluxio,the errors are: <denchmark-code>Error: unable to build kubernetes objects from release manifest: error validating "": error validating data: ValidationError(DaemonSet.spec.template.spec.affinity.podAffinity): unknown field "RequiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution" in io.k8s.api.core.v1.PodAffinity </denchmark-code>
and <denchmark-code>Error: unable to build kubernetes objects from release manifest: error validating "": error validating data: ValidationError(DaemonSet.spec.template.spec.affinity.podAffinity.requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution[0]): missing required field "topologyKey" in io.k8s.api.core.v1.PodAffinityTerm </denchmark-code>
The cause of the first error is "RequiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution" is an invalid fieldï¼Œit should be "requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution" . The cause of the second error is missing field "topologyKey".
